notes: Older apartment with basic furnishings and dated fixtures including window AC units, old-style kitchen with exposed pipes, and brown tile accents. Clean but not renovated. For baby safety: tile floors are easy to clean but hard on falls, windows have security bars which is good, no visible balcony hazards. Natural light appears limited with small windows covered by bars/blinds. Spacious layout at ~30 ping with separate bedrooms suitable for a family.
